extendedInfo.description: If you are Eric Church's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Eric Church's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Eric Church's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Eric Church's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Sinners Like Me- Carolina- Chief-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - A Lot Of Boot Left To Fill- Ain't Killed Me Yet- Before She Does- Can't Take It With You- Carolina- Chevy Van- Country Music Jesus- Creepin'- Drink In My Hand- Faster Than My Angels Can Fly- Guys Like Me- Hell On The Heart- His Kind Of Money / My Kind Of Love- Homeboy- How Bout You- Hungover & Hard Up- I'm Gettin' Stoned- Jack Daniels- Keep On- Leave My Willie Alone- Lightning- Like Jesus Does- Livin' Part Of Life- Longer Gone- Love Your Love The Most- Lovin' Me Anyway- Michael- My Hearts Got A Memory- Over When It's Over- Pledge Allegiance To The Hag- Sinners Like Me- Smoke A Little Smoke- Springsteen- Still Standing Their Ground- The Hard Way- These Boots- Those I've Loved- Two Pink Lines- What I Almost Was- Where She Told Me To Go- Without You Here- Woke Up This Morning- You Make It Look So Easy- Young And Wild
